title: John Heitinga - Wikipedia
snippet: John Gijsbert Alan Heitinga (born 15 November 1983) is a Dutch football coach and former player who was most recently the head coach of Eredivisie club Ajax.

title: John Heitinga Biography, Career Info, Records & Achievements
snippet: Hailing from Netherlands, John Heitinga was born on 15th November 1983 in Alphen aan den Rijn. Nicknamed as Johnny, is a Dutch football coach and a former professional football player who played as a centre back.

title: John Heitinga: Age, Net Worth, Family & Career Highlights - Mabumbe
snippet: Born on November 15, 1983, in Alphen aan den Rijn, Netherlands, Heitingaâ€™s career spanned top European clubs and the Dutch national team. Post-retirement, he transitioned into coaching, bringing his wealth of experience to the sidelines.

title: Biography John Heitinga - John Heitinga
snippet: John Heitinga (November 15, 1983) started his football career at SV ARC in his hometown Alphen aan den Rijn. When John was only seven years old, he attracted the attention of his favourite club Ajax Amsterdam.

title: John Heitinga Biography | Pantheon
snippet: John Gijsbert Alan "Johnny" Heitinga (born 15 November 1983) is a Dutch football coach and a former player who played as a centre back. He is currently the assistant first-team coach at Premier League club Liverpool.
